data.title: Complex palindrome
data.statement: A complex palindrome is a string that is a palindrome when only its alphanumeric characters are considered and the case of the characters is ignored. The task is to determine whether a given string is a complex palindrome.

testCases.title: Example
testCases.testOut: complex palindrome, never odd or even

testCases.title: True
testCases.testIn: A man, a plan, a canal, Panama!
testCases.testOut: complex palindrome, a man a plan a canal panama

testCases.title: False
testCases.testIn: I wrote an essay using my pen

testCases.title: A bit tricky
testCases.testOut: complex palindrome, madam in eden im adam

testCases.title: Was it a cat?
testCases.testIn: Was it a car or a cat I saw?
testCases.testOut: complex palindrome, was it a car or a cat i saw

data.stubGenerator:
read text:string(40)
write is it a complex palindrome?
data.inputDescription: A string [[text]] made of ASCII characters.
data.outputDescription:
if the string is a palindrome the program will return {{complex palindrome}} and the filtered text separated by a comma and a space. The filtered text will be all lowercase and will have a  space between the words.
 
if the string is not a palindrome the program will return {{not a complex palindrome}}.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

A complex palindrome is a string that is a palindrome when only its alphanumeric characters are considered and the case of the characters is ignored. The task is to determine whether a given string is a complex palindrome.
Input
A string text made of ASCII characters.
Output
if the string is a palindrome the program will return complex palindrome and the filtered text separated by a comma and a space. The filtered text will be all lowercase and will have a space between the words.

if the string is not a palindrome the program will return not a complex palindrome.
Constraints
Example
Input
Never odd or even.
Output
complex palindrome, never odd or even
